name: Dilemma (itch) (ValiantShadow)
description:
You sit across from a lone detective. He's got a cold heart and an agenda. 
There's been a murder, and he wants to know who's responsible. 
What will you do?
Be advised, this game contains strong language and allusions to dark themes.
Submitted for O2A2 2022
This is my first-ever completed game, such as it is. It's rough around the edges, but I enjoyed the experience quite a bit, and I'm looking forward to making more visual novels in the future! 
I found out about this jam with only two days to spare, so! I hope I did all right! Haha.
